svt_axi_interconnect_callback Class Reference

Inheritance diagram for class svt_axi_interconnect_callback:

List of all members.

Detailed Description

Interconnect callback class contains the callback methods called by the interconnect component.


Public Member Functions

function void  new ( string name = "svt_axi_interconnect_callback" )
virtual function void  post_input_port_get ( svt_axi_interconnect axi_interconnect , svt_axi_ic_slave_transaction xact )
virtual function void  post_master_to_slave_xact_mapping ( svt_axi_interconnect axi_interconnect , svt_axi_ic_slave_transaction ic_xact_from_master , svt_axi_master_transaction ic_xact_to_slave )
virtual function void  post_slave_xact_gen ( svt_axi_interconnect axi_interconnect , svt_axi_master_transaction xact )
virtual function void  pre_output_port_put ( svt_axi_interconnect axi_interconnect , svt_axi_ic_slave_transaction xact )

  function void
 svt_axi_interconnect_callback::new
 (  string name = "svt_axi_interconnect_callback"  ) 

CONSTUCTOR: Create a new callback instance
 Superseded functions 
 uvm_object :: new 
 uvm_callback :: new 

 virtual function void
 svt_axi_interconnect_callback::post_input_port_get
 (  svt_axi_interconnect axi_interconnect , svt_axi_ic_slave_transaction xact  ) 

Callback issued just after receiving a coherent transaction

axi_interconnect - A reference to the svt_axi_interconnect component that is issuing this callback. The user's callback implementation can use this to access the public data and/or methods of the component.

xact - A reference to the transaction descriptor object of interest.

 virtual function void
 svt_axi_interconnect_callback::post_master_to_slave_xact_mapping
 (  svt_axi_interconnect axi_interconnect , svt_axi_ic_slave_transaction ic_xact_from_master , svt_axi_master_transaction ic_xact_to_slave  ) 

Callback issued after the interconnect randomizes a transaction to be routed to a slave

ic_xact_from_master - A reference to the transaction descriptor object of interest.

ic_xact_to_slave - A reference to the transaction descriptor object of interest.

 virtual function void
 svt_axi_interconnect_callback::post_slave_xact_gen
 (  svt_axi_interconnect axi_interconnect , svt_axi_master_transaction xact  ) 

Callback issued after the interconnect randomizes a transaction to be routed to a slave.

xact - A reference to the data descriptor object of interest.

 virtual function void
 svt_axi_interconnect_callback::pre_output_port_put
 (  svt_axi_interconnect axi_interconnect , svt_axi_ic_slave_transaction xact  ) 

Callback issued after the interconnect receives all responses from snooped ports and before driving coherent response to corresponding port.

axi_interconnect - A reference to the svt_axi_interconnect component that is issuing this callback. The user's callback implementation can use this to access the public data and/or methods of the component.

xact - A reference to the transaction descriptor object of interest.
